creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: three full lines of bold calligraphy, fourth partial line; oval relief stamp URC; two square intaglio stamps LLC
inscription: on label L edge of scroll when rolled, in Japanese
markings: URC, rectangular relief; LLC, top stamp, square intaglio; LLC, lower stamp, square intaglio; stickers on each roller cap: [Sho Chiku]
title: Large Poem in Four Columns
